thread.title: Stylish industrial chic hotel in Queens
thread.title_full: Stylish industrial chic hotel in Queens - Review of The Paper Factory Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: medox_de
title: Stylish industrial chic hotel in Queens
text:
Very trendy New York style hotel with relaxed and friendly staff, good music and a good restaurant. A must see if you like industrial chic. Astoria is in walking distance and Manhattan 20-40 min by car. The only minus is the almost non-existing breakfast option, not at all keeping up with international standards except for the good coffee.
Room Tip: Rooms can be a bit noisy from other rooms. You might want to pick a corner room. See more room tips
